TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AccessKeyPressedEventHandler(object sender, AccessKeyPressedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AccessKeyPressedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AccessKeyPressedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AccessKeyPressedEventArgs)
public delegate void AccessKeyPressedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AccessKeyPressedEventArgs ^ e);
type AccessKeyPressedEventHandler = delegate of obj * AccessKeyPressedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将处理 附加事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的访问键[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]由管理器类的行为有些像访问密钥的服务，并将转发到的访问键输入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]输入系统。Access keys in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] are handled by a manager class that acts somewhat like a service for access keys, and forwards access key input to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input system. 而不是处理按下事件的专门通过附加的处理程序的访问密钥附加事件对特定对象，它通常是更好的做法，若要通过命令绑定，将访问密钥与特定命令相关联，然后处理通过相应的路由事件的路由的命令。Rather than handling access key pressed events specifically by attaching a handler for the attached event on a specific object, it is generally a better practice to associate the access key with a particular command through a command binding, and then handle the routed commands through the corresponding routed events. 此方法为用户输入而不考虑哪些输入模式下启动的输入提供统一的事件系统。This technique provides a unified event system for user input regardless of what input mode initiated the input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
